sentence.Network_en: Metacercariae may endure in the encysted state for several months.

sentence.Network_en: The direct compression and artificial digestion method were used to examine the encysted metacercaria of C.

sentence.Network_en: Objective To study the infection of freshwater fishes with the encysted metacercaria of Clonorchis sinensis.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的了解淡水鱼华支睾吸虫囊蚴感染情况.
